org.apache.flink.runtime.rest.handler.legacy.metrics

类 AggregatingSubtasksMetricsHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.rest.handler.legacy.AbstractJsonRequestHandler
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.rest.handler.legacy.metrics.AbstractAggregatingMetricsHandler
        • org.apache.flink.runtime.rest.handler.legacy.metrics.AggregatingSubtasksMetricsHandler
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    RequestHandler

    public class AggregatingSubtasksMetricsHandler
extends AbstractAggregatingMetricsHandler
    Request handler that returns, aggregated across all subtasks, a list of all available metrics or the values for a set of metrics.

    Specific subtasks can be selected for aggregation by specifying a comma-separated list of integer ranges. /metrics?get=X,Y&subtasks=0-2,4-5
